remarks: An inverse in the category of non-unital rings is the converse operation.  (Contributed by AV, 28-Feb-2020.)
statement:
rngcsect.c $e |- C = ( RngCat ` U ) $.
rngcsect.b $e |- B = ( Base ` C ) $.
rngcsect.u $e |- ( ph -> U e. V ) $.
rngcsect.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. B ) $.
rngcsect.y $e |- ( ph -> Y e. B ) $.
rngcinv.n $e |- N = ( Inv ` C ) $.
rngcinv $p |- ( ph -> ( F ( X N Y ) G <-> ( F e. ( X RngIsom Y ) /\ G = `' F ) ) ) $.
